data1.Desc: An error occurs during the Spring Boot Thin/Fat Jar Builder JPS packages installation
Cyclos packages from the Marketplace cannot be installed due to the Java 11 requirement in the latest Cyclos versions
The settings-custom configuration file is ignored during the initial installation of the Let’s Encrypt add-on
The webroot value should remain false for the old Let’s Encrypt add-ons during the upgrade
Incorrect permissions for the /etc/phpMyAdmin file on some MySQL/MariaDB/Percona tags
An error occurs when restarting NGINX PHP after redeploying to the older version
The passwordless access to databases should be disabled
An error occurs when restarting Apache PHP after redeploying to the older version
The mysqld service should not be running on the Apache PHP servers by default
The 'RuntimeError: Your version of SQLite is too old' error page is opened by default when accessing the Ruby-based environments
GraalVM Java engine is installed when creating Maven with OpenJDK 8 via API
HAProxy restart fails with the missing /usr/sbin/haproxy directory error
An error occurs when building an application using the native-image tool on the GraalVM-based Java nodes
Empty firewall rules on the WildFly application server after creation
An error occurs when installing WildFly Cluster from the Marketplace
The $WEBROOT environment variable is missing on the WildFly application server
The autofs process on the client node crashes during the storage restart
Kubernetes Cluster cannot be installed from the container types hint in the topology wizard
An error occurs when restarting nodes with the 'jem service restart' command
The REDIS_ENABLED environment is ignored when restarting LiteSpeed (LLSMP) application server via the 'jem service restart' command
The 'jem service reload' command should work on the Litespeed ADC without sudo permissions
Mounts from the GlusterFS-cluster have incorrect parameters
Jenkins auto-cluster creation via API fails if the account’s cloudlets limit is lower than the recommended value in the package
The /etc/sysconfig/jenkins file permissions are changed after enabling custom SSL for the environment with Jenkins node(s)
An error occurs when disabling custom SSL on the Jetty node

data2.Desc: Abnormal memory usage and RDP connection failure on the Windows VM nodes after migration
Multiple abandoned sessions in the containers
Incorrect minimum cloudlets number for the Marketplace packages with SQL database nodes
An error occurs when creating an environment via the JPS package
An error occurs during the Jitsi package installation
Kubernetes Cluster 1.18.6 installation fails on the platforms below the 5.9.3 version
Docker tags for some repositories cannot be fetched
An error occurs when increasing disk space for the Windows VM nodes
Old disk space value is displayed in the topology wizard after increasing disk size for the Windows VM node
An error occurs when trying to create Windows VM via the topology wizard
The disk cost is colored incorrectly in the estimated price widget of the topology wizard
